% recommended engine : pdflatex -> biber -> pdflatex -> pdflatex
% $ latexpand main.tex > arxiv.tex
% $ cp main.bbl arxiv.bbl
\documentclass[10pt]{beamer}
\mode<presentation>

\usetheme{Frankfurt}
\usefonttheme{structurebold}
\usecolortheme{seahorse}
\usecolortheme{rose}

\input{../src/packages.tex}
\input{../src/commands.tex}
\input{../src/terms.tex}
\input{../src/theorem.tex}

\title{\termUntitledDocument}
\author[\termJohnDoe]{\termJohnDoe \\ \texttt{\exampleEmail}}
\institute{\exampleAffiliation}
%\date{}
%\date[\exampleEventShort]{\exampleEvent}

\usepackage[english]{babel}
%\hyphenation{...-...-...}

\usepackage[
    backend=biber,
    style=alphabetic
]{biblatex}
%\usepackage{xurl} % url breaks for all alphanumerical characters and = / . : - ~ ' "
%\hypersetup{breaklinks=true}
%\renewcommand*{\bibfont}{\small}

\addbibresource{../bib/main.bib}

\begin{document}

\begin{frame}
    \titlepage
\end{frame}

\begin{frame}
    \frametitle{\termOutline}
    \tableofcontents
    %\tableofcontents[pausesections]
\end{frame}


\section{\termIntroduction}
\label{section:01.00}

\subsection{\termIntroduction}
\label{subsection:01.00.01.00}
\input{../src/section-01.00.S/01.00.tex}

\subsection{\termRelatedWorks}
\label{subsection:01.00.02.00}
\input{../src/section-01.00.S/02.00.tex}


\section{\termMainResults}
\label{section:02.00}

\subsection{\termStatementsOfTheMainResults}
\label{subsection:02.00.01.00}
\input{../src/section-02.00.S/01.00.tex}

\subsection{\termProofsOfTheMainResults}
\label{subsection:02.00.02.00}
\input{../src/section-02.00.S/02.00.tex}


\section{\termUnsolvedProblems}
\label{section:03.00}

\subsection{\termUnsolvedProblems}
\label{subsection:03.00.01.00}
\input{../src/section-03.00.S/01.00.tex}


\begin{frame}
    \frametitle{\termReferences}
    \printbibliography
    %\printbibliography[heading=none]
    %\printbibliography[title=\termReferences]
\end{frame}

\end{document}
